org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys

Class Subsys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.inject.AbstractModule
      • org.sysfoundry.kiln.base.sys.Subsys
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.inject.Module
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventSubsys, ServerSubsys, ServerTestSubsys, SysSubsys

    public abstract class Subsys
extends com.google.inject.AbstractModule
    The Subsys represents an Abstraction of the Subsys in Kiln. The Subsys provides the below capabilities for any Sub system extending from this Abstract Guice Module.
    • Subsys Configuration support - Ability to load subsys configuration from the Subsys's package
    • SubsysInfo support - Ability to register SubsysInfo provided by the concreted child subsystem
